name: Zero-js
body:
## The future is now.
`zero.js` is the world's smallest javascript framework, compressed to only `0kb`. It requires no transpiling, no bable runtimes, and uses the javascript syntax you already know!

Simply write your functions in plain old jacascript (`POJS`) and watch as they run seamlessly in the browser!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
